# Package models

```{r setup, echo = FALSE}
library(EPACmodel)

model_readmes <- c()
for (mod in rev(list_models())){
  model_readmes <- c(model_readmes,
                     fs::path_package("models", mod, "README.Rmd",
                                      package = "EPACmodel"))
}
```

